verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come and go with me to my Father's house,
To my Father's house, to my Father's house.
Come and go with me to my Father's house
Where there's peace, peace, peace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The body will be there, in my Father's house, etc.
Jesus will be there, in my Father's house, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh ven conmigo hermano
/a la casa de mi padre/(3)
donde hay paz, paz, paz.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nos darán un anillo…
Nos harán un banquete…
Tendremos una fiesta…
Allí estaremos juntos…
Allí nos gozaremos…
Vida si habrá…
Odio no habrá…
Amor si habrá…
Tropiezo no habrá…
